title: Necessary Pursuit
description: Hot sexy triplet #2 (The one who’s grumpy.)Oscar has no desire to join one of the two secret societies issuing him invitations and he sure as hell isn’t interested in an arranged menage marriage. They say you can’t die of a broken heart, but he almost did.But refusing to join either society doesn’t stop him from being caught up in the danger that surrounds them. When he finds himself racing to decode a dangerous mystery alongside a sexy physicist, and a man with a price on his head, Oscar will turn into the protective hero he never wanted to be. All he has to do is evade a serious threat from a religious cult, defuse a bomb, prevent a war between the Trinity Masters and the Masters’ Admiralty...oh...and not fall in love.
author: Mari Carr
